name: com.alice.sdf
description: Stand on math. SDF raymarching + UdonSharp collision for VRChat worlds. Deep Fried optimized.

samples.description: Ground plane + sphere. The simplest SDF world.
Sun + orbiting planet + ring + moon. Animated solar system.
Menger Sponge labyrinth with twist. Walk inside infinite fractals.
Fractal planet + torus ring + onion shell. Cosmic Ã— Fractal fusion.
Touch/hit the wall and it dents. Dents recover over time. VR hand interaction.
Squishy mochi blobs. Grab, merge, split, and grow. SmoothUnion soft-body physics.
Dig holes and build hills with VR hands. You ACTUALLY fall into holes you dig. Impossible without SDF.
